name: formation
description: Static site publishing with S3, Lambda, and Terraform
author: Derek Lieu <dl@dereklieu.com>

scripts.copy: mkdirp build && cd lambda && copy ./*.{js,json} ../build && cd ..
scripts.terraform-plan: cd ./infrastructure/env-dev && terraform get && terraform plan --var-file ./terraform.tfvars && cd ../..
scripts.terraform-apply: cd ./infrastructure/env-dev && terraform get && terraform apply --var-file ./terraform.tfvars && cd ../..
scripts.deploy: npm run clean & npm run build && npm run copy && npm run lambda-install && npm run zip && npm run terraform-apply
